issue.title: [R] More accurately determine output type of an aggregation expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13854](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13854). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13740 added some basic heuristics but the C++ library surely knows the actual types, we just need to find out how to ask it.
